name: GCSELatinWords
0:
”Alexa, open g. c. s. e. latin words”
”Alexa, start g. c. s. e. latin words”
”Alexa, launch g. c. s. e. latin words”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: g. c. s. e. latin words
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Impress everyone with your knowledge of Latin by using this skill to learn hundreds of Latin words. Regular use of this skill can help you learn the fundamental Latin vocabulary quickly and effortlessly.

GCSE Latin Words will help you extend your vocabulary by reading and spelling Latin words and then translating them in to English. There's a short pause after each Latin word and spelling to give you time to test yourself.

There are a total of 450 words and you can choose from adjectives, adverbs, conjunctions, nouns, particles and prepositions, pronouns or verbs. Words will be presented in groups of 10. 

To start just say... "alexa open g. c. s. e. latin words"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
